snippet.title: SRK Exclusive: Samurai Shodown Ukyo Character Trailer
snippet.description:
Athlon Games and SNK provided SRK with early access to the character trailer for Ukyo! We hope you enjoy the crazy fast action only Samurai Shodown can provide! Samurai Shodown releases on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on June 27th, with PC and Nintendo Switch versions to follow sometime afterward. Don't forget to register for Evo 2019 to compete in the upcoming title!

http://evo.shoryuken.com/

http://shoryuken.com | http://twitch.tv/SRKlive
